title: How to unsubscribe from Target Circle 360
description: Learn how to cancel your Target Circle 360 subscription through your account, alternative payment channels, or registered postal mail. Ensure cancellation is completed at least 24 hours before your next billing cycle to avoid further charges. Membership fees are non-refundable.

steps_1.title: Cancel Automatic Renewal via Target Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Target 360 subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Log into your account on the Target website.
*   Go to where you purchased your membership (usually at checkout).
*   Scroll down to "Order Management".
*   Click on "Renewal Management".
*   Select "Cancel Automatic Renewal".
*   Confirm when prompted.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

steps_2.title: Cancel Automatic Renewal via Postal Mail
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Target 360 subscription via postal mail, follow these steps:

*   Retain the registered mail receipt and delivery confirmation if you cancel via postal mail.

seo_text: Cancel Target Circle 360 subscription. Follow these steps to unsubscribe from Target Circle 360 and avoid future charges. Learn how to cancel your Target Circle 360 membership online, through the Target app, or by sending a registered letter. Get instructions for managing your Target Circle 360 renewal and ensuring successful cancellation.
